document.full_text: guatemalan police on tuesday arrested a 71-year-old suspected drug trafficker that the united states has sought for alleged ties to mexico's powerful sinaloa cartel.
document.title: guatemala captures drug fugitive sought by u.s.
lines_and_colors: guatemalan police on tuesday arrested a 71-year-old suspected drug trafficker that the united states has sought for alleged ties to mexico's powerful sinaloa cartel.
